item.description:
Welcome to everyone intrigued by Hypnosis & Neuro-Linguistic Programming (NLP). Here are the details of the November meeting of the Greater Boston Hypnosis and NLP group. [b]This month’s topic:

Topic:Hypnosis for Self-Confidence

Lack of Self-Confidence is not an uncommon issue.  Many people incur this feeling in many cases.  It affects our ability to do things or bebe good at things, to create new relationships, to get out of our comfort zone.  As a matter of fact, a lack of self-confidence creates a rather small comfort zone.

Learn and experience how you can bring more self-confidence into your life, into your situations where it is needed.

 

 Kevin Martin, CHT

Hypnotist Positive Effects Methuen, MA (978) 494-4542 kenda_assoc@msn.com www.poseffects.com

---------------------------------- Helping people to help themselves

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: The Grtr Boston Hypnosis and NLP Meetup - Lexington-Hypnosis for Self-Confidence
